skins.shipDescription: G-class destroyer ` Glowworm, Hull Number H92!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am G class' Glowworm! People say it's hard getting near me, but I actually like skinship engagements~! Commander, Commander, I am always energetic! W-whaa!
skins.acquisition: Hello! I am the Royal Navy's G-class destroyer, Glowworm! Commander, want to play with me today? I'm pretty good at hide and seek!
skins.login: Commander, Commander, you're so slow! What took you so long? Hurry up, let's go have some fun!
skins.details: Commander, watch me, watch me! I don't become dizzy no matter how many times I spin myself! Amazing, right? Praise me, praise me~!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hey there, you defenseless commander, eat my Glowworm CQC! Unya! Ah, I stubbed my toe...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Stay still, the cola is going to overflow. I'm gonna drink it before it makes a mess! *chugs*
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, do you think we can make a whirlpool if we spin on the water fast enough?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe... That tickles! I'm going to tickle you back, Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nnngggh! Damn you, perverted Commander! I'm gonna headbutt you! *donk*
